Wondrous Item, Legendary (Requires Attunement by a Cleric, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)
This luminous garment is made from rich purple cloth stitched with spirals, runes, and comets in golden thread. It has a long hood of black, trimmed in white dragon scales.
You gain the following benefits while wearing the robe:

  • Creatures of the Void will not attack you while you wear the robe.
  • If you arenâ€™t wearing armor, your base armor class is 14 + your Dexterity modifier.
  • You can speak and understand Void Speech.
  • Your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 1 for spells with the void keyword. Targets have disadvantage on saving throws against these spells.
